paper_metadata.title: Changes in children and mothers' nutritional status in extreme poor households after raising out of poverty through income-generating activities programme in rural Bangladesh

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: After 2 years of the IGA programme, the prevalence of stunting significantly declined from 40•3 % to 33•0 % (P = 0•003), anaemia declined from 51•6 % to 44•0 % (P = 0•020) while mothers' CED (Chronic Energy Deficiency) declined from 52•0 % to 42•7 % (P < 0•001)
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Children and mothers were measured with regarding their nutritional status before and after the IGA programme commenced

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Extreme poor households took part in the IGA programme for 2 years
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Extreme poor households took part in the IGA programme
